info.title: Task Pro API 1.0.
info.description:
Introducing Task Pro API, the ultimate task management application designed to empower users in creating and managing boards with their tasks seamlessly. Whether you're a professional managing complex projects or an individual looking to stay organized, Task Pro is your go-to solution for efficient task tracking and collaboration.

Some useful links:
- [Task Pro API repository](https://github.com/001elijah/bc48-node-team-project-backend)
